name: Yarn Arsonist
description:
A game where you play as an arsonist with a limited supply of matches and an unlimited supply of yarn.

===MUSIC===

Apero Hour, Dances and Dames, Fast Talkin, Kool Kats, RetroFuture [Nasty Mix], Secret of Tiki Island, and Spy Glass by Kevin MacLeod (http://incompetech.com)
